description:
Mob is finally pushed to his limit when he has to face Sakurai, Muraki, Matsuo and Ishiguro of the upper echelon. But then, he comes to a rather surprising decision...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mob and Reigen: A Giant Tsuchinoko Appears
Mob et Reigen ~ Le chapitre du tsuchinoko ~
Mob to Reigen: Kyodai Tsuchinoko Genru no Maki
モブと霊幻~巨大ツチノコ現るの巻~
